definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Growing up in a family of musicians, he was saturated with music at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 他在音樂世家長大，小時候就飽受音樂薰陶。

sentences.english: The Sulzberger family has had control of the “newspaper of record” ever since.
sentences.chinese: 該家族就此成了掌控報業的世家。

sentences.english: Bai Bohua, born in Beijing in 1944 to a literary family.
sentences.chinese: 白伯驊，1944年出生於北京的一個書香世家。

sentences.english: The Chi-tan great families were closely related with the families?polarization of the tribe union period.
sentences.chinese: 契丹世家大族與部落聯盟時期的家族分化密切相關。

sentences.english: The formation of the Eastern Han Dynasty confucian classics family depended on the political and cultural aspects.
sentences.chinese: 東漢經學世家的形成取決於政治和文化兩個方面。

sentences.english: Maison Bouey is one of the last few independent family companies in Bordeaux.
sentences.chinese: 寶邑世家是波爾多僅存的幾家獨立傳統家族酒商之一。

sentences.english: He comes from a family of puppeteers and is the sixth generation in his family to inherit this tradition.
sentences.chinese: 他出身於木偶表演世家，是家中第六代木偶戲傳人。

sentences.english: Laurie came from a skating family.
Io was of divine ancestry. Her father was the river-god Inachus, son of Oceanus.
sentences.chinese: 伊俄出身於神祗世家，父親是俄刻阿諾斯的兒子。

sentences.english: Born into a musical family, Micheline graduated from the Paris Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 她出身於音樂世家，獲得巴黎音樂學院授予的學位。

sentences.english: Jolie comes from a family of actors.
Shen Jinli was born into a mainstream sculpture family in Xiamen, South Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 沈錦麗，出生在廈門的一個漆線雕工藝世家。

sentences.english: Chapter One examines the families of rank in Jiading district to clarify the ancient local tradition.
sentences.chinese: 第一章考察嘉定世家望族，闡明當地古學傳統。

sentences.english: He is born for music and his name is JJ Lin.
sentences.chinese: 他出生於音樂世家，他的名字叫林俊杰。

sentences.english: Fan Han represents the eleventh generation of poets in the Literary Family of Fan in Nantong.
sentences.chinese: 範罕是南通範氏詩文世家第十一代詩人的代表。

sentences.english: "Balenciaga"Fashion has always been good at cutting and sewing.
sentences.chinese: “巴黎世家”服裝一向是精於裁剪和縫製。

definition: offspring a famous family (idiom); good breeding/blue blood
royal family/imperial household/member of the royal family
collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
learned person/expert in a certain field/abbr. for 大方之家[da4 fang1 zhi1 jia1]
direct line of descent/under one's personal command/school or faction passing on faithfully one's doctrine
the imperial court/the government in imperial times
the Zhou family (household, firm etc)/Jow-Ga Kung Fu - Martial Art
